CustomField.formula: IF(IsActive= FALSE, "Not Active", IF(AND(ISNULL(StartDate__c),ISNULL(EndDate__c)), "Never Expires", IF(AND(NOT(ISNULL(StartDate__c)),ISNULL(EndDate__c),StartDate__c<=TODAY()), "Current without End Date", IF(AND(NOT(ISNULL(StartDate__c)),NOT(ISNULL(EndDate__c)),StartDate__c<=TODAY()), "Current with End Date", IF(AND(NOT(ISNULL(EndDate__c)),EndDate__c<TODAY()), "Expired", IF(AND(NOT(ISNULL(StartDate__c)),StartDate__c>TODAY()), "Future","Other"))))))
CustomField.label: Validity
